title: Musk isn’t serious about fighting, Zuckerberg says. Here’s the latest.
description: The Facebook-turned-Meta CEO said Sunday it's time to move on from the idea he will meet the Twitter-turned-X owner in the ring for charity.

title: Professors have a summer assignment: Prevent ChatGPT chaos in the fall
description: College professors worry that ChatGPT will sow chaos on campuses this fall. They also await guidance from university leadership on how to deal with AI technology.
